title: Senya and Oscar vs Zombies
description: Senya and Oscar vs Zombies is a 2D side-scrolling game where you play as Senya, who needs to survive the zombie apocalypse. Later, you will find a cute orange cat that you named Oscar, and it will accompany you to kill all the zombies! Loot some useful items to equip such as helmet, armor, and weapon. Collect money and use it to upgrade yourself. Get ready to survive in the zombie world.
